body_html:
I ran into this issue as well. A temporary work around could be to re-package the tensor of argmax b into a new Variable.

Something like:

b = torch.max(a, 1)[1].repeat(1,5).float().data
o = (Variable(b) + a).sum()

This does not raise any error for me!

body:
I ran into this issue as well. A temporary work around could be to re-package the tensor of argmax b into a new Variable.

Something like:
```
b = torch.max(a, 1)[1].repeat(1,5).float().data
o = (Variable(b) + a).sum()
```

This does not raise any error for me!
